Welcome to the home page of Group-15 project website on **VAST Challenge Mini Challenge 1 and 3**. This project is part of the coursework of Visual Analytics and Applications, taught by Professor [Dr. Kam Tin Seong](https://www.smu.edu.sg/faculty/profile/9618/KAM-Tin-Seong) at Singapore Management University.

The website covers the work carried out to develop interactive visualizations to solve the VAST challenge. The report also covers the previous work conducted in this challenge. A full step user guide is also provided for easy replication. For readers wishing to get more context quickly on the application, you may refer to the Poster tab.
